response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth noting that this product holds a significant importance to me, reflecting my investment of over $1,200,000 in its development and refinement. Considering its immense worth to you, I am extending a special offer to purchase it for $950,000. This price encapsulates not only the cost of production but also the strategic value it could bring to your endeavors. I believe this is a mutually beneficial proposition, allowing us to reach a fair agreement while respecting the product's true market value. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to contact me. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
